objectives.title: Lower cost per ticket without harming service quality
objectives.rationale: Support costs are rising while CSAT declines.

kpis.name: Cost per ticket
kpis.definition: Average support cost per resolved ticket.

capabilities.name: Conversational AI
capabilities.description: Ability to automate standard customer requests.

outputs.name: Automated FAQ workflows
outputs.description: Live automation flows for top-tier inquiries.

assumptions_and_gaps.item: KPI baseline, data source, and objective owner role
assumptions_and_gaps.needed: Confirm baseline values, authoritative data sources, and accountable owner role.
assumptions_and_gaps.impact: Targets cannot be validated without confirmed baselines and ownership.
